mapper.select: SELECT lt.type_code AS lt_type_code, lt.name AS lt_name, lt.description AS lt_description, lt.object_version_number AS lt_object_version_number, lv.value_code AS lv_value_code, lv.type_code AS lv_type_code, lv.name AS lv_name, lv.description AS lv_description, lv.object_version_number AS lv_object_version_number FROM lookup_type lt LEFT JOIN lookup_value lv ON lt.type_code = lv.type_code WHERE lt.type_code = #{typeCode}
